title: 42 Simulation
short-descr: Perform closed-loop control with the 42 Simulator
description: In this project you will install and configure the 42 simulator so it communicates
with the Basecamp 42 library and app suite. You will gain experience running and
configuring a controller in a closed-loop environment.
script-instructions: - This script installs Linux packages required by 42
post-install-instructions:
The Basecamp GUI must be restarted to complete the BC42 app installation.
The 42 project doc describes how to start 42 in a
separate terminal window.
